sentences.english: B. C. C. I. became a magnet for drug money.
sentences.chinese: 国际信贷银行像一块大磁铁，吸引贩毒的钱。

sentences.english: When fractional-reserve banks expand credit, malinvestments result.
sentences.chinese: 当部分储备银行扩张信贷是，不正当的投资产生了。

sentences.english: There are both deductions and credits associated with higher education.
sentences.chinese: 与高等教育相关的有扣减和信贷这两种方式。

sentences.english: Second, local governments and enterprises are worried that the credit policy could be tightened.
sentences.chinese: 第二，地方政府和企业担心未来信贷政策会收紧。

sentences.english: The liquidity of subprime-mortgage securities was at the heart of the credit crisis.
sentences.chinese: 次级抵押证券的流动性，处于信贷危机的漩涡中心。

sentences.english: But credit is the lifeblood of the car business.
sentences.chinese: 但信贷的确是汽车产业的命根子。

sentences.english: This is Credit Department, what can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 这是信贷部，能为您做点什么？

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: A banker can hardly afford a scandal, my dear.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，银行家也不会向不名誉的人提供信贷。

sentences.english: Fine, if a mortgage is the only credit you have.
sentences.chinese: 如果抵押贷款成了你唯一的信贷时，罚款。

sentences.english: SGS also develops and certifies its own standards.
sentences.chinese: 信贷保证计划还开发和证明自己的标准。

sentences.english: The money is probably loans coming back to banks as deposits.
sentences.chinese: 投出的信贷很可能以存款的方式又回到了银行。

sentences.english: Forcing too much liquidity on banks stifles credit.
sentences.chinese: 强制银行流动性过多，将会遏制银行信贷。

sentences.english: If credit growth roars on, the Chinese central bank will have a lot of trouble controlling inflation.
sentences.chinese: 如果信贷持续增加，央行控制通货膨胀将步履维艰。

sentences.english: The Populist platform demanded easier credit and currency policies to help farmers.
sentences.chinese: 人民党的政纲要求放松信贷和货币政策以帮助农民。

sentences.english: But the efficiency of this kind of exogenous credit contract is not high.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种外生性信贷合约的效率却不高。
